languages.text: "Любезные обитатели Четвертого Складочного — люди незамысловатые, но преданные..." {n}Фактотум небрежно кивает в сторону оборванных работяг.{/n} "...щедро согласились примкнуть к моему сводному отряду, чтобы... как это они выразились... "бить поганую мятежню". Очень добропорядочный клан, я распоряжусь, чтобы им была выделена дополнительная водно-кислородная пайка".

"The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."
languages.original_text: "Любезные обитатели Четвертого Складочного — люди незамысловатые, но преданные..." {n}Фактотум небрежно кивает в сторону оборванных работяг.{/n} "...щедро согласились примкнуть к моему сводному отряду, чтобы... как это они выразились... "бить поганую мятежню". Очень добропорядочный клан, я распоряжусь, чтобы им была выделена дополнительная водно-кислородная пайка".

A most honourable clan indeed, I will order that they are assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

languages.text: «Los amables residentes del depósito 4 son gente leal sin pretensiones...». {n}El Factótum hace un gesto de cabeza hacia los trabajadores agotados.{/n} «Han aceptado generosamente unirse a mi grupo improvisado para "darle su merecido a la escoria amotinada", en sus propias palabras. Un clan de lo más honorable, sin duda. Ordenaré que les asignen raciones de agua y oxígeno adicionales».
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

traits.locale_text: «Los amables residentes del depósito 4 son gente leal sin pretensiones...». {n}El Factótum hace un gesto de cabeza hacia los trabajadores agotados.{/n} «Han aceptado generosamente unirse a mi grupo improvisado para "darle su merecido a la escoria amotinada", en sus propias palabras. Un clan de lo más honorable, sin duda. Ordenaré que les asignen raciones de agua y oxígeno adicionales».

languages.text: 「第四倉庫の親切な住民たちは、気取らず忠実な人達です…」{n}ファクトタムはボロボロの労働者たちの方へ軽く頭を下げる。{/n}「彼らは私の即席部隊に加わり、『反乱を起こしたクズどもをメチャクチャに叩きのめす』ことに快く同意してくれました。実に立派な一族だ。彼らに追加の水と酸素を配給するように命じます」
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

traits.locale_text: 「第四倉庫の親切な住民たちは、気取らず忠実な人達です…」{n}ファクトタムはボロボロの労働者たちの方へ軽く頭を下げる。{/n}「彼らは私の即席部隊に加わり、『反乱を起こしたクズどもをメチャクチャに叩きのめす』ことに快く同意してくれました。実に立派な一族だ。彼らに追加の水と酸素を配給するように命じます」

languages.text: “四号货栈的船员虽然朴素，但却无比忠诚……”{n}高阶顾问漫不经心地朝衣衫褴褛的工人们点了点头。{/n}“他们慷慨地加入了我的临时队伍。用他们的话说，就是‘把那群叛徒揍出屎来’。这个氏族的人确实非常值得敬佩，我准备给他们分配额外的净水与氧气补给。”
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

traits.locale_text: “四号货栈的船员虽然朴素，但却无比忠诚……”{n}高阶顾问漫不经心地朝衣衫褴褛的工人们点了点头。{/n}“他们慷慨地加入了我的临时队伍。用他们的话说，就是‘把那群叛徒揍出屎来’。这个氏族的人确实非常值得敬佩，我准备给他们分配额外的净水与氧气补给。”

languages.text: "Die freundlichen Bewohner von Depot 4 sind einfache, aber treue Leute ..." {n}Das Faktotum nickt beiläufig in Richtung der Arbeiter in ihren Lumpen.{/n} "Sie haben großzügigerweise angeboten, sich meiner improvisierten Bande anzuschließen, um 'diesen Meutererpack das Blut aus dem Leib zu prügeln', wie sie es formuliert haben. Ein wirklich höchst ehrenwerter Clan. Ich ordne an, dass sie zusätzliche Wasser- und Sauerstoffrationen erhalten."
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

traits.locale_text: "Die freundlichen Bewohner von Depot 4 sind einfache, aber treue Leute ..." {n}Das Faktotum nickt beiläufig in Richtung der Arbeiter in ihren Lumpen.{/n} "Sie haben großzügigerweise angeboten, sich meiner improvisierten Bande anzuschließen, um 'diesen Meutererpack das Blut aus dem Leib zu prügeln', wie sie es formuliert haben. Ein wirklich höchst ehrenwerter Clan. Ich ordne an, dass sie zusätzliche Wasser- und Sauerstoffrationen erhalten."

languages.text: « Les habitants du dépôt 4 sont d'une extrême amabilité et d'une loyauté sans faille, {n}continue le factotum en désignant de la tête les ouvriers en haillons.{/n} Dans leur grande générosité, ils ont accepté de se joindre à mon petit groupe improvisé pour, je cite, "bottez le cul de cette foutue racaille". Un clan des plus honorables. Je vais ordonner qu'on leur distribue des rations supplémentaires d'eau et d'oxygène. »
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants du dépôt 4 sont d'une extrême amabilité et d'une loyauté sans faille, {n}continue le factotum en désignant de la tête les ouvriers en haillons.{/n} Dans leur grande générosité, ils ont accepté de se joindre à mon petit groupe improvisé pour, je cite, "bottez le cul de cette foutue racaille". Un clan des plus honorables. Je vais ordonner qu'on leur distribue des rations supplémentaires d'eau et d'oxygène. »

languages.text: "4. Depo'nun muhterem sakinleri, mütevazı ama sadık insanlardır..." {n}Kâhya, yıpranmış işçilere bakıp yavaşça baş sallıyor.{/n} "Sağ olsunlar, kurduğum bu eğreti kuvvete kendi deyimleriyle 'isyancı adilerin ağzını burnunu kırmak' için katıldılar. Sahiden de onurlu bir klan. Kendilerine ilave su ve oksijen kumanyaları gönderteceğim."
languages.original_text: "The kindly inhabitants of Depot 4 are unpretentious but loyal people..." {n}The Factotum nods casually toward the ragged labourers.{/n} "They have generously agreed to join my improvised posse to 'beat the mutinous scum bloody raw,' as they put it. A most honourable clan indeed. I shall order that they be assigned additional water and oxygen rations."
